name: Dicing With Death (3079, blobasaur, chertkov)
description:
CONTROLS:

Arrows/WASD/Left Stick/D-Pad to move; Tab/Y to switch between dice

Q+E/L1+R1 - move camera

Z/B - undo, R/X - restart

Move the die with a deadly beam attached to it to eliminate all the demons on the game board.

Programming by 3079, art by blobasaur, audio by chertkov.

Made in Unity, Photoshop, Blender, Ableton Live 11.
